title: Did the criminal justice activist Donna Hilton speak at the National Democratic Congress?
subtitle: The rumors on the Internet that Hilton, who was convicted of a terrible murder in 1985 and spent decades behind bars, took place in DNC.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Donna Hilton, convicted of kidnapping, torture and murder of a real estate broker in 1985, spoke at the National Democratic Congress in August 2020.
